In this video I discuss the custom gaming table I built 2 years ago. I constructed it very cheaply, for under $70. I also review the things I like and dislike about it now that I've used it for quite a while and talk about what I am going to do differently when I build the next one. 

I primarily use this table to play Dungeons & Dragons but it's design would work for numerous tabletop games. 

#DIY #DnD #gamingtable
